title: EDIT_Team Update, Team Name misinterpreted_SDBB-185
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is on the Facebook Messenger Bot

custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the team name should not be misinterpreted by the bot and should respond with the correct team info

i.e. User requests "Red Sox" so Bot should respond with "Red Sox" response, not "White Sox" response

EDIT? 

WHEN the user makes a team update request with phatic info (in this instance phatic means anything unrelated to baseball)
AND the team name is misinterpreted by the bot

i.e. Tiggers (instead of Tigers)

THEN if product decides to treat "Tiggers" as "phatic"* speech, then the bot is expected to respond to "Tiggers" by saying "Bouncing is what they do best", or "huh?"

However, our bot will likely spell-check Tiggers -> Tigers, and treat it as a request for the Tigers team

title: EDIT_Team vs. Team, This Season the Teams Have Not Meet or Will Not Meet Again_SDBB-298
custom_preconds:
*NOTE:* To clarify, "win the season series" means the two teams' records against only each other that season. In other words, if the Yankees and Mets play 9 times this season, what's the record in those 9 games.


GIVEN the user is in Facebook Messenger
custom_steps:
WHEN the user requests to get information about the next time a team plays an opponent.

i.e.

- yankees mariners
- yankees mariners series
- when do the yankees and mariners play?
- when is the yankees mariners?
- when is the next yankees mariners series?
- when do the yankees and mariners play next?
- when did the yankees and mariners last play?
custom_expected: THEN most responses should be that standard preview/live/wrap text + cards (FB Messenger) Bambot already uses

custom_steps_separated.content: When the two teams requested have not yet played during the regular season
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then following is needed on the preview card:

- Language: The $TeamName and $TeamName haven’t played yet this season. Their first matchup is $GameDate.
- Buy Tickets button is included

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the request is for a future matchup of two teams that don't play again during the regular season
AND there is No Tie.
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the following language is needed:

The $TeamName and $TeamName don’t play again this season. The $WinningTeamName won the season series, $WinningTeamRecord.

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the request is for a future matchup of two teams that don't play again during the regular season
AND there is a Tie.
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the following language is needed:

$TeamName and $TeamName don’t play again this season. They tied the season series, $TeamVTeamRecord.

AND game cards for both games 1 & game 2 are provided

The RequestedTeamName had a doubleheader on GameDate against the OpponentTeamName. They won/lost the first game, ScoreLeadingToTrailing, and the second game was Postponed/Suspended/Canceled.

i.e.
The White Sox had a doubleheader on May 26th against the Tigers. They lost the first game, 3-2, and the second game was postponed.

title: EDIT_Team vs. Team, Teams Do Not Play Today_SDBB-298
custom_preconds:
*NOTE:* To clarify, "win the season series" means the two teams' records against only each other that season. In other words, if the Yankees and Mets play 9 times this season, what's the record in those 9 games.


GIVEN the user is in Facebook Messenger
custom_steps:
WHEN the user requests to get information about the next time a team plays an opponent
AND the teams do not play today

i.e.

- yankees mariners
- yankees mariners series
- when do the yankees and mariners play?
- when is the yankees mariners?
- when is the next yankees mariners series?
- when do the yankees and mariners play next?
- when did the yankees and mariners last play?
custom_expected:
THEN the bot response should be the standard preview text
AND preview game card (FB Messenger) Bambot already uses

custom_steps_separated.content: When the two teams requested have not yet played during the regular season
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then following is needed on the preview card:

- Language: The $TeamName and $TeamName haven’t played yet this season. Their first matchup is $GameDate.
- Buy Tickets button

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the user request is for a future matchup of two teams that don't play again during the regular season
AND there is No Tie.
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the following language is needed:

The $TeamName and $TeamName don’t play again this season. The $WinningTeamName won the season series, $WinningTeamRecord.

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the user request is for a future match up of two teams that don't play again during the regular season
AND there is a Tie.
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the following language is needed:

$TeamName and $TeamName don’t play again this season. They tied the season series, $TeamVTeamRecord.
